name: All You Need is Love Reclaimed Barnwood Sign
description:
This rustic barnwood sign is hand painted with the simple, yet lovely quote, "All You Need Is Love". It is made from barnwood that was reclaimed from our Wisconsin family farm. The wood is nearly 100 years old. 

The beauty of working with this medium is that every piece is unique and full of character before I even begin to paint it. The wood has been left untreated to let it's natural grey patina and reddish tones show through. 

This sign is the perfect wall art for your master bedroom, great room, cottage or cabin, hallway, foyer, or to lean on the mantle of your fireplace. 

Because of its size, it would also be perfect as part of a wall display of various artwork.

This sign is ideal as part of a rustic wedding decor or gift for the couple.

DETAILS:

*11.5" wide x 15" high

* Barnwood has a mostly natural grey tone, however there are occasionally spots of red. 

* The words "All You Need Is" are painted in white and the word "Love" is in a golden yellow.

* This sign is made to order. Due to the nature of barnwood, there may be slight variations in the wood.

*A sawtooth hanger will be attached to the back of the sign for hanging

name: Inspirational Wall Art Reclaimed Barnwood Sign
description:
This rustic barnwood sign is handpainted with the inspirational quote, "You can only regret those experiences from which you do not learn". It is made from barnwood that was reclaimed from our Wisconsin family farm. The wood is nearly 100 years old. 

The beauty of working with this medium is that every piece is unique and full of character before I even begin to paint it. The wood has been left untreated to let it's natural grey patina and reddish tones show through. 

This sign is the perfect wall art for your great room, cottage or cabin, hallway, foyer, bedroom or to lean on the mantle of your fireplace.

Because of its size, it would work perfectly as part of a wall display of varying pieces.

And of course it makes the perfect gift for any occasion, including weddings, birthdays, graduation, or a house warming.


DETAILS:

* 11.5" high x 23" wide

* Barnwood has a mostly natural grey tone, however there are occasionally spots of red. 

* The words are painted in white.

* This sign is made to order. Due to the nature of barnwood, there may be slight variations in the wood.

*A sawtooth hanger will be attached to the back for hanging.

name: Remember Be Awesome Wall Art Barnwood Sign
description:
This rustic barnwood sign is hand painted with the simple, yet quirky quote, "Remember: Be Awesome" and colorful elephant silhouette design. It is made from barnwood that was reclaimed from our Wisconsin family farm. The wood used is nearly 100 years old.

The beauty of working with this medium is that every piece is unique and full of character before I even begin to paint it. The wood has been left untreated to let it's natural grey patina and reddish tones show through. 

This sign is the perfect wall art for your home, cottage or cabin, nursery, child's room, or man-cave.

It would make the perfect baby shower or graduation gift!

DETAILS:

* 15" wide x 11.5" high

* Barnwood has a mostly natural grey tone, however there are occasionally spots of red. 

* The words "Remember: Be Awesome" are painted in white and the elephant silhouette is in a blue-green.

* This sign is made to order. Due to the nature of barnwood, there may be slight variations in the wood.

* A sawtooth hanger will be attached to the back for hanging.

name: Woodburning Sign Inspirational Wall Art Pyrography
description:
This rustic wood sign has been woodburned by hand with the inspirational nature quote, "Storms Make Trees Take Deeper Roots." and tree silhouette design. It has been made from a naturally dried, rough cut cedar slab. 

The beauty of working with this medium is that every piece is unique and full of character before a design is even added. The wood has been treated with a polycrylic water-based sealer to prevent discoloration and to bring out the rich tones of the wood. All woodburnings have been completed by hand using a woodburning tool. 

This sign is the perfect wall art for your home, cottage or cabin, country kitchen, hallway, or foyer.

It would also make a wonderful gift, especially for that nature-lover in your life!

DETAILS:

* 30" wide x 6.5" high (at tallest point)

* Wood is cedar with a satin polycrylic water-based sealer.

* This listing is for the exact sign shown here, not a replica.

* A sawtooth hanger has been attached to the back of the sign for hanging.

name: Mason Jar Holder on Reclaimed Barnwood - Dream Create Inspire
description:
This rustic barnwood sign is handpainted with the simple, yet lovely quote, "Dream Create Inspire". With an attached mason jar that can be used as a vase or holder, this piece is both beautiful and functional. It is made from barnwood that was reclaimed from our Wisconsin family farm. The wood is nearly 100 years old. 

The beauty of working with this medium is that every piece is unique and full of character before I even begin to paint it. The wood has been left untreated to let it's natural grey patina and reddish tones show through. The mason jar is securely attached with a hose clamp which can be opened to remove the jar if necessary. 

This sign is the perfect wall art for your great room, country kitchen, cottage or cabin, baby nursery, hallway, foyer, or to lean on the mantle of your fireplace. Or the perfect addition to your studio, it's sure to bring you creative inspiration!

Because of its size, it would also be perfect as part of a wall display of various artwork.

And it would make the perfect graduation gift! 


DETAILS:

* 10.5" high x 15" wide

* Barnwood has a mostly natural grey tone, however there are occasionally spots of red. 

* The words "Dream Create Inspire" are painted in white.

* This listing is for the exact sign shown here, not a replica.
